text: Michelle Veintimilla (born November 7, 1992) is an American actress. She is best known for playing Janie in the movie Not Cool. She played the role of villain Firefly in the second and fourth seasons of the Fox television series Gotham. She played Carmen Guerra on FOX's The Gifted and Marie Joblanski on the Netflix crime drama series Seven Seconds.‘Seven Seconds’ Trailer: Regina King Seeks Justice In Netflix Crime Anthology Series ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors
title: Michelle Veintimilla
